channel.title: OSL:YAR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in OSL:YAR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Yara Shares Rise as US Blue Ammonia Project with BASF Scrapped
item.description: Yara International ASA and BASF SE are abandoning a project to develop a low-carbon ammonia production facility on the US Gulf Coast, sending shares of the Oslo-listed fertilizer company higher.

item.title: Yara Shares Rise as US Blue Ammonia Project with BASF Scrapped
item.description: Yara International ASA and BASF SE are abandoning a project to develop a low-carbon ammonia production facility on the US Gulf Coast, sending shares of the Oslo-listed fertilizer company higher.
